nodes.text: Hadrios was a male pilot of the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, Hadrios was assigned to General Hera Syndulla's task force as part of the Deliverance's starfighter wing, which was tasked with hunting the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. Hadrios was in the hangar aboard the Deliverance, when his fellow pilots were preparing for a battle with the 204th at Chadawa. His wing's commander, Wyl Lark, threw an arm around Hadrios and reminded him how proud the man's brother would be when he finally returned to Corellia.
Hadrios first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
